meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a jungle.
meanings.sent1: The backyard had a jungly feel with all the tall trees and wild plants.
meanings.sent2: The explorers ventured into the jungly forest, surrounded by lush greenery.
meanings.sent3: The house cat thought the overgrown garden was a jungly paradise to explore.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jungly maze of thoughts, tangled and hard to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The jungly landscape painted a vivid picture of untamed wilderness.

meanings.definition: Covered with dense vegetation like a jungle.
meanings.sent1: The path through the park was so jungly that it felt like a secret hideaway.
meanings.sent2: The overgrown ruins of the ancient temple were jungly and mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The backyard had become so jungly that it was like a mini wilderness in the city.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a jungly tangle of curls, impossible to comb through.
meanings.sent5: The jungly forest was a green sea of leaves, hiding all manner of creatures.
